sentence.Network_en: They must be sedulously tended , if the vivifying fruits are to be at hand when needed.
sentence.Network_cn: 要想在需要的时候能够得到充满生机的果实,那就必须进行勤勉的护理.

auth_sentence.content: It felt "vivifying," she remembers, to immerse herself in a world in which symmetry and order reigned.
